posts.postText:
Offender name?: umbrelacorp(megasound)
Which Server?: TTT
Offender's Steam ID?: STEAM_0:1:23364369
What the Offender did?: Teamkill and Leave
Proof?: Screenshots

Screenshot that shows him as traitor with a team kill 
Screenshot of events log showing he stabbed me 
Screenshot of him leaving 

Him and I were both traitors and he stabs me; to be fair there were innocents around and he may of just missed but I find that unlikely.
He does not respond to anything I ask him after the innocents kill him for stabbing me and then leaves shortly after without a word.
I've seen him playing before and I think this is his first issue but I may be wrong on that.
I really want more of an explanation than punishment, but if he doesn't respond then I think some length of a ban should go through
